faq_questions.question: Which is better for NFL betting: FanDuel or DraftKings?
answer_points: FanDuel: Best for user experience, SGP builder interface, 4.9/5 app rating
DraftKings: Best for props variety, Flash Betting, 29.9% best underdog prices
FanDuel leads in market share and casual bettor satisfaction
DraftKings offers more extensive markets and props organization
Both offer competitive odds - recommend having accounts at both for line shopping
FanDuel better for SGPs, DraftKings better for live betting depth

faq_questions.question: Where is NFL betting legal?
answer_points: Legal in 30+ states plus DC
Major states: NY, NJ, PA, IL, MI, CO, AZ, VA, MD, OH, LA, MA, KS, KY, etc.
All 7 featured sportsbooks available in majority of legal states
Age requirement: 21+ in most states (18+ in MT, NH, RI, WY, DC)
List top 10 states with links to state pages
Not legal: CA, TX, FL, GA (as of November 2025)

faq_questions.question: What are the best NFL player prop bets?
answer_points: Most popular: Passing yards, rushing yards, receiving yards, touchdowns
FanDuel offers 40+ props per game with SGP integration
BetMGM has most props in industry
DraftKings organizes props by category for easy navigation
Anytime TD scorer, first TD scorer very popular
Link to NFL Player Props Guide for strategy

faq_questions.question: How do NFL Same Game Parlays work?
answer_points: Combine multiple bets from single NFL game into one parlay
FanDuel has industry-leading SGP builder and interface
Caesars offers up to 12 legs (most in industry)
Can mix spreads, totals, player props from same game
Higher payouts but correlated outcomes
Use TES Parlay Calculator to estimate payouts

faq_questions.question: Which sportsbook has the fastest payouts for NFL betting?
answer_points: BetMGM fastest: 2 hours via PayPal/Play+
FanDuel: 48 hours via PayPal/Play+
DraftKings: 48-72 hours via PayPal/Play+
Play+ prepaid card typically fastest method across all sites
Bank transfers take 3-5 business days
Debit card withdrawals 1-3 days depending on bank

faq_questions.question: Can I live bet on NFL games?
answer_points: Yes - all 7 featured sportsbooks offer NFL live betting
DraftKings Flash Betting: Bet on every down
Caesars and bet365: Live streaming integrated
Live spreads, totals, props update in real-time
ESPN BET BetVision: Stream and bet on same screen
Early cash-out available on many live bets
Link to NFL Live Betting Strategy page

faq_questions.question: How do I read NFL betting odds?
answer_points: American odds format: Negative (-110) = favorite, Positive (+150) = underdog
Spread: Team must win by more than point spread
Moneyline: Straight-up winner, no spread
Totals: Combined score over or under number
-110 odds = bet $110 to win $100
+150 odds = bet $100 to win $150
See Understanding NFL Odds section for detailed explanation
